column8: The mythology of the golden lotus is this collection�s major theme. The artisans amalgamated perfectly formed red ruby pieces into the fine gold backdrop. All gems were chosen for their perfection of color, and embedded with fastidious care. In this presentation the flower profile looks subtle, gorgeous and entirely natural. Chinese people believe that the collaboration of red and gold colors depict the concept of contentment.

Inspired by the finest attributes of peacock feathers, Grand Pavone beautifully captivates all sensual aspects of charm, elegance and pride. Pure gold decorated with blue topaz gemstones remarkably reveals the most impeccable craftsmanship handcrafted on delicate patterns of peacock feathers, enhancing such valuable aspects of the most precious moments.
